items.sentence: I can\'t stand it here any longer. I need a change of scenery.
I can\'t tell you his name, but I can tell you where he lives.
When I opened the door, Tom was standing there wearing a suit.
When you breathe out in cold weather, you can see your breath.
I really appreciate your offer to help me clean out my garage.
I wonder if there is any reason to translate this into French.
My favorite subjects in high school were geometry and history.
Tom apparently didn\'t want to go to Mary and John\'s wedding.
Tom exchanged the red shirt Mary had given him for a blue one.
Tom finished eating all the ice cream that was in the freezer.
Tom folded the map and put it back into the glove compartment.
Tom found it difficult to finish all the work in just one day.
Tom gave Mary the receipt and told her to put it in her purse.
I can\'t think of anyone more deserving of the award than Tom.

The train was delayed for two hours because of the heavy snow.
Tom always thought that John and Mary were such a nice couple.
Tom and Mary want to buy a house with at least three bedrooms.
Tom asked Mary to marry him, but she turned down his proposal.
Did you have to share a bedroom with your brothers or sisters?
